messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

version upgrade span wednesday re version upgrade hello order update currently maternity leave occasional thank version upgrade hello please advised update version version highly critical perform possible based availability order avoid virus attacks latest virus database available order update please follow steps more detailed guide found software center by searching software center search menu best endpoint agent install selected wait installation status becomes installed reboot computer icons newly installed endpoint tools note during update process lose approximately minutes questions encounter difficulties upgrading please hesitate thank kind regards ext hub

message.reasoning:

I'm considering "Miscellaneous" as the most suitable category, given the lack of a more precise option for software upgrades.
